io.micronaut.cli.io.support

Class SpringIOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.cli.io.support.SpringIOUtils

  • public class SpringIOUtils
extends Object
    Simple utility methods for file and stream copying. All copy methods use a block size of 4096 bytes, and close all affected streams when done.

    >Mainly for use within the framework, but also useful for application code.

    Since:
    06.10.2003
    Author:
    Juergen Hoeller, Graeme Rocher

                           Resource[] resources,
                           File targetDir)
                    throws IOException

        resources - The resources to copy
        targetDir - The target directory
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error
